description: This Java class is a Spring Boot REST controller that handles fund transfer-related API endpoints. It provides methods to process fund transfer requests via POST and retrieve a list of past transfers via GET. The class is annotated for Swagger documentation and uses Lombok for boilerplate reduction.
published: more technical details may be determined by package-private access, but none explicitly visible here

classes.name: FundTransferController
classes.description: A REST controller managing fund transfer API endpoints, allowing clients to initiate fund transfers and retrieve transfer history.

methods.name: sendFundTransfer
methods.description: Handles POST requests to process a fund transfer based on the provided request data.

methods.name: readFundTransfers
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a paginated list of all fund transfer records.
